price: Yeroo suuraan Rabbitti amanaa ergamaa Isaa wajjiinis qabsaa’aa isaaniin jettu tokko buufamte, isaan irraa warri qabeenya qaban si hayyamsiifatu“Nu dhiisi; nuti warra taa’an wajjin taanaa” jedhan.
arabic: وَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتۡ سُورَةٌ أَنۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَجَٰهِدُواْ مَعَ رَسُولِهِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡذَنَكَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلطَّوۡلِ مِنۡهُمۡ وَقَالُواْ ذَرۡنَا نَكُن مَّعَ ٱلۡقَٰعِدِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā unzilat sūratun an āminū bil-lahi wajāhidū maʿa rasūlihi is'tadhanaka ulū al-ṭawli min'hum waqālū dharnā nakun maʿa al-qāʿidīna
